job.title: Junior Data Center Engineer/Linux
job.description: A SaaS company in Center City Philadelphia is looking to bring on a Junior Datacenter Engineer to join the team of about six other Engineers. This environment is primarily a Linux (CentOS/Debian) shop, so you should have experience troubleshooting hardware, managing Servers (upgrades), scripting with Bash, SAN platforms, Virtualization, and more.  This position is perfect for someone looking to grow into more of a Linux Engineer or Cloud Engineer. This company offers a ton of growth, training, ability to work on new technology, excellent work life balance and full benefits. What You Will Be Doing  Tech Breakdown Daily Responsibilities The Offer Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis now and in the future.
